summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of various array joining functions such as column stacking, concatenation, depth stacking, horizontal stacking, generic stacking, and vertical stacking, covering normal operation, edge cases, shape and dtype constraints, memory layout, axis handling, and error conditions.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of array join operations in the numerical computing library, preventing regressions and ensuring compatibility across different data types, dimensions, memory orders, and hardware devices.
